c74object.name: fl.tomax~
c74object.digest: Turn frames into host messages or control signals.
c74object.description: The maximum length of the output message may be limited by the host environment. Vector and tagged frame types are both supported if supported by the host.

method.name: info
method.description:
Print info about this object to the max window for reference purposes. If no arguments are provided then all information is posted to the Max window. Else, a set of flags is used to select which sections of the reference to display, and whether or not the information should be provided in a shortened form.
The following flags are available:
description - display the object description.inputs - display info on inputs.outputs - display info on outputs.io - display info on both inputs and outputs.parameters - display info on the object parameters.quick - display shorten versions of any info displayed.

method.name: frame
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib's connection routines. User messages have no effect.

method.name: sync
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib's connection routines. User messages have no effect.

attribute.name: rt
attribute.description:
Sets the realtime state for this object. When set to 0 this object can form part of a non-realtime network for processing in message threads, using buffer~ objects for audio IO.
More info on non-realtime processing with FrameLib can be found in Tutorial 11.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description:
Sets the context name for this object.
More info on FrameLib contexts can be found in Tutorial 10.
